title: Font resembling Cooper Black, appr. 2-3 years old, famous designer, can you help me remember the name?
content:
Hi,

I don't have an image of my requested font; please let me explain:

The font I am looking for is very similar to Cooper Black. It's kind of a variation of it done by a famous font designer (whose name I also can't remember). It was so close that a non-designer probably couldn't tell it from Cooper Black.

I read about this font 2 or three years ago when it was introduced, and it is available online somewhere. I don't think the name is anything similar to Cooper...

Can you name the font?

Would be just great ;-)

TIA  
Huggy
author: huggyGiraffe

comments.content:
The closest to Cooper Black in my library is Goudy Heavyface, but it is 70 years old. Linotype Pabst is also close.  
So many types to chose from and no time to know them all!  
Regards  
Dr.Type

Sauna, from Underware, is my fave neo-Cooper.

[http://vllg.com/Underware/Sauna/mudTyper+Weights/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326171845/http:/vllg.com/Underware/Sauna/mudTyper+Weights/ "http://vllg.com/Underware/Sauna/mudTyper+Weights/")

[http://www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=sauna&id2=overview](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326171845/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=sauna&id2=overview "http://www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=sauna&id2=overview")

[http://www.type.fi/SuomiTubby.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326171845/http:/www.type.fi/SuomiTubby.html "http://www.type.fi/SuomiTubby.html")

This is another great Cooper-esque family that has come out in the last few years.

Ray Larabie's [Soap](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326171845/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/soap/) might fit the bill.

- Lex
i vote oz. patrick giasson did it literally based on cooper. it's at vllg.com filed under thirstype.

thanks everybody...and the winner is.... [Soap](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326171845/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/soap/). It's the one I was looking for, but then Oz also looks really good.

G'nite  
Huggy
